content:
TITLE: Building Velocity with Gradle
DESCRIPTION: Command to build the Velocity proxy server using the Gradle wrapper script. This will execute the full build cycle and generate the proxy JAR file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/papermc/velocity/blob/dev/3.0.0/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
./gradlew build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing CMake on macOS with Homebrew (Bash)
DESCRIPTION: Uses the Homebrew package manager (`brew`) to install the `cmake` build tool, which is a prerequisite for compiling the native libraries on macOS. Assumes Homebrew is already installed on the system.
SOURCE: https://github.com/papermc/velocity/blob/dev/3.0.0/native/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
brew install cmake
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building All Linux Natives with Docker (Bash)
DESCRIPTION: Executes the `build-all-linux-natives.sh` script located in the `build-support` directory to compile native libraries for Linux (x86_64 and aarch64) using Docker. Requires Docker with multi-platform build capabilities configured. This script handles building for both OpenSSL 1.1.x and 3.x.x versions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/papermc/velocity/blob/dev/3.0.0/native/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
./build-support/build-all-linux-natives.sh
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building macOS Natives (Bash)
DESCRIPTION: Executes the `compile-macos.sh` script located in the `build-support` directory to compile native libraries specifically for macOS aarch64 ("Apple Silicon"). Requires `cmake` to be installed (e.g., via Homebrew). Building on x86_64 macOS might work but is untested.
SOURCE: https://github.com/papermc/velocity/blob/dev/3.0.0/native/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
./build-support/compile-macos.sh
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Example Individual Linux Build Scripts (Bash)
DESCRIPTION: Lists the individual shell scripts (`compile-linux-compress.sh` and `compile-linux-crypto.sh`) located in `build-support` that are used to build the compression and cryptography components separately on Linux. These can serve as a starting point for building on other Unix-like systems, requiring manual adjustments and installation of dependencies like a C/C++ toolchain, CMake, and OpenSSL.
SOURCE: https://github.com/papermc/velocity/blob/dev/3.0.0/native/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
build-support/compile-linux-compress.sh
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
build-support/compile-linux-crypto.sh
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: GPL v3 License Header Template for Velocity
DESCRIPTION: The standard GNU General Public License v3 header that should be included at the top of all source files in the Velocity project. The template includes a placeholder for the copyright year ($YEAR).
SOURCE: https://github.com/papermc/velocity/blob/dev/3.0.0/HEADER.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
/*
 * Copyright (C) $YEAR Velocity Contributors
 *
 * This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
 * it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
 * the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
 * (at your option) any later version.
 *
 * This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
 * but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
 * MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
 * GNU General Public License for more details.
 *
 * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
 * along with this program.  If not, see <https://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
 */
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining MIT License Header Template for Velocity API
DESCRIPTION: A standard copyright header template for Velocity API source files, using the MIT License. The template includes a $YEAR placeholder that would be replaced with the actual copyright year when applied to source files.
SOURCE: https://github.com/papermc/velocity/blob/dev/3.0.0/api/HEADER.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
/*
 * Copyright (C) $YEAR Velocity Contributors
 *
 * The Velocity API is licensed under the terms of the MIT License. For more details,
 * reference the LICENSE file in the api top-level directory.
 */
```
